articles.description: Loved when new, rejected by purists used, and now on the rise again as a classic - happy birthday, 996
articles.content: Its not like Porsche to be behind the curve on anything, but only now has it seen fit to mark 25 years of the first water-cooled 911, the 996. This is despite the actual debut taking place at the 199… [+4430 chars]
